description:
Yuki is practically bouncing off the walls after coming up with an idea
to take a field trip outside the school grounds. Rii-san and Kurumi remind her that
club members aren`t supposed to leave the grounds, but Yuki`s convinced that if it`s
a school-sponsored activity they won`t be breaking the rules. Their destination: the mall!
Take a stroll down memory lane, to the days before the group first met Mii-kun.
Source: crunchyroll
